text: Uppena () is an upcoming Indian Telugu-language film directed by Bucchi Babu Sana, and jointly produced by Sukumar Writings and Mythri Movie Makers. The film features debutants Panjaa Vaisshnav Tej and Krithi Shetty, with Vijay Sethupathi playing a prominent role. The music is composed by Devi Sri Prasad, with cinematography handled by Shamdat, and editing by Navin Nooli. ==Cast == * Panjaa Vaisshnav Tej as Aasi * Krithi Shetty as Sangeetha * Vijay Sethupathi as Rayanam * Gayatri Jayaraman as Sangeetha's motherhttps://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xzunlLhgcfs * Rajsekhar Aningi * Master Raghavan as young Aasihttps://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mrqgz4_a4PU == Production == === Development === In January 2019, Mythri Movie Makers announced their new project in association with director Sukumar under his banner Sukumar Writings, which stars Panjaa Vaishnav Tej, brother of Sai Dharam Tej. The film is being helmed by Sukumar's assistant and newcomer Bucchi Babu Sana and music is composed by Devi Sri Prasad. Vaisshnav Tej's relatives, actors Chiranjeevi, Nagendra Babu, Allu Arjun and Sai Dharam Tej graced the event held on 21 January 2019. === Casting === At the launch event Manisha Raj was announced as lead actress who is also a debutant. However in May 2019, another debutant Krithi Shetty replaced Manisha as lead actress. In April 2019, Mythri confirmed that Vijay Sethupathi will be seen as antagonist in the movie. === Filming === The production on the film started in May 2019. On 21 August 2019, Vijay Sethupathi started filming for the movie. It was announced that 40 percent of the movie was shot and filming was completed by October 2019. ==Soundtrack== Devi Sri Prasad was signed on to compose the film's soundtrack album and background score. A glimpse of the first single "Nee Kannu Neeli Samudram" was unveiled on 1 March 2020, and the full song was released by Aditya Music the following day. The song was penned by Sri Mani with Hindi lyrics were written by Raqueeb Alam and sung by Javed Ali and Srikanth Chandra. == Marketing and release== It was planned to be released on 2 April 2020 but it has been postponed due to the COVID-19 pandemic. == References == == External links == * Category:Indian films Category:Films scored by Devi Sri Prasad Category:Indian action films Category:Indian action drama films Category:Films set in Andhra Pradesh Category:Films shot in Andhra Pradesh Category:2020s Telugu-language films Category:Upcoming Telugu-language films Category:Upcoming films Category:Films postponed due to the COVID-19 pandemic
title: Uppena
